com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.CheckBoxButtonBuilder
public class CheckBoxButtonBuilder extends ButtonBaseBuilder<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox, CheckBoxButtonBuilder>
The CheckBoxButtonBuilder class is a utility class for constructing CheckBox instances with properties configured using a fluent API. It extends the ButtonBuilderBase by supporting to bind the checkbox's selected state to a boolean property.
